meta.title: About Us - Product Beers
meta.description: Meet Valencia's product community. We connect, enrich and cultivate product talent.

hero.label: Our Story
hero.titleStart: Where product is shared over a
hero.description: It all started with an afternoon of beers between two strangers with something in common: the world of product and Valencia. Since then, Product Beers has grown into the go-to community for product professionals in the city.

mission.title: Connect
mission.description: Building bridges between professionals and enthusiasts, creating a strong network that empowers Valencia's product industry.

vision.title: Enrich
vision.description: Through events and sessions, inspiring our community to reach higher levels of knowledge and professional excellence.

values.title: Cultivate
values.description: Nurturing a culture where respect, collaboration and innovation flourish. Because product is better done in community.

team.label: The Team
team.title: Meet the organizers
team.description: A group of product enthusiasts who decided to create the space they themselves wanted to find.

cta.title: Ready to join?
cta.description: Join 130+ product lovers in our Telegram group and stay updated on upcoming events.
